plot: A coming-of-age story about two teenagers trapped in a small mountain town whose interest in glam rock and voodoo lures them out into the world.
title: Floyd and the Straight Edge
plot_es: A coming-of-age story about two teenagers trapped in a small mountain town whose interest in glam rock and voodoo lures them out into the world.
plot_en: A coming-of-age story about two teenagers trapped in a small mountain town whose interest in glam rock and voodoo lures them out into the world.
